snippet: Remarks made more than a decade ago on the Israeli-Palestinian conflict by Samantha Power, who was named the next United States ambassador to the United Nations, were repeated by a newspaper report in Israel on Wednesday.
abstract: Remarks made more than a decade ago on the Israeli-Palestinian conflict by Samantha Power, who was named the next United States ambassador to the United Nations, were repeated by a newspaper report in Israel on Wednesday.

byline.original: By CHRISTINE HAUSER and ROBERT MACKEY

headline.main: Video of Samantha Power's 2002 Remarks on Imposing Peace on Israel Could Haunt Her, Israeli Paper Says

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
